name: Godzilla
description: Crafted from the genetics of God Bud, Godzilla is a mostly indica strain bred by Caña de España specifically for hot climates. Crushing euphoria and sedation are delivered alongside a sour berry flavor accented with subtle notes of vanilla. Thoughts wander away, taking with them stress, anxiety, and depression. After some time, Godzilla’s effects subside to clearheaded, functional bliss. Patients treating pain and muscle spasms may find relief in Godzilla’s potent and tranquilizing onset. Following a 55 day flowering cycle indoors or at the end of September outdoors, this indica produces colorfully vibrant buds of green and purple hues.
descriptionPlain: Crafted from the genetics of God Bud, Godzilla is a mostly indica strain bred by Caña de España specifically for hot climates. Crushing euphoria and sedation are delivered alongside a sour berry flavor accented with subtle notes of vanilla. Thoughts wander away, taking with them stress, anxiety, and depression. After some time, Godzilla’s effects subside to clearheaded, functional bliss. Patients treating pain and muscle spasms may find relief in Godzilla’s potent and tranquilizing onset. Following a 55 day flowering cycle indoors or at the end of September outdoors, this indica produces colorfully vibrant buds of green and purple hues.

highlightedReviews.text: A friend randomly came to my house one day with some fat nugs of this zilla, and then I can't remember the rest of the story..

I don't taste the berry, flower flavor in Godzilla. I taste earthy, citrusy, lemon flavors. It's a good indica, relaxing body sedation, yet clear-headed. Don't let the name intimidate you. Regular indica users will find this one soft as a kitten. Smooth taste and comforting. You'll want to curl up with a good book with this one.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Godzilla, Omega Dawg, Stella Blue, Punky Lion, and Swazi Gold
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Special thanks to all of our Leafly users who nominated these strains to be included in the Leafly database! First up is Godzilla, a crushingly heavy indica that will maul stress, anxiety, and physical ailments like a giant, bipedal Japanese lizard. Punky Lion is similarly powerful, containing only indica genetics for maximum sedation and relief. Omega Dawg is a lighter 50/50 hybrid strain that won't leave you feeling so destroyed, but rather in the blissful space between full-body relaxation and dreamy bliss. Stella Blue is a mostly sativa strain that lifts your mood into the clouds, and Swazi Gold is a landrace sativa that has traveled all the way from Africa to bless our bowls with its presence.
Remember to leave a review if you have the chance to enjoy one of these newcomers!
   1. Godzilla
Characteristics of Godzilla:

Mostly indica
Bred using God Bud genetics
Breeder: Caña de España
Sour berry and vanilla aroma
Brings heavy euphoria and sedation
May help with stress, anxiety, pain, and muscle spasms
Indoor flowering time of 55 days

   2. Omega Dawg
Characteristics of Omega Dawg:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Chemdawg and Space Queen
Breeder: Alphakronik Genes
Skunky, diesel aroma
Delivers full-body relaxation coupled with invigorating cerebral euphoria
May help with pain, multiple sclerosis, and muscular dystrophy
Indoor flowering time of 65 to 75 days

   3. Stella Blue
Characteristics of Stella Blue:

70% sativa
Cross between Blueberry and an unknown sativa
Sweet berry and orange aroma
Has happy, giggly, and uplifting effects

   4. Punky Lion
Characteristics of Punky Lion:

Pure indica strain
Cross between Chronic and Matanuska Tundra
Sweet, earthy cocoa aroma
Brings heavy sedating effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks

   5. Swazi Gold
Characteristics of Swazi Gold:

Sativa landrace strain from Africa
Sweet citrus aroma
Indoor flowering time of 55 to 85 days
